授業目的: The purpose of this lecture is to study about four topics in development economics: (i) theory of economic growth, (ii) economic development and foreign aid, (iii)economic development and international trade, (iv) negative sides of economic development
到達目標:
(1) Students understand the key points for each topic.
(2) Students collect data relevant to each topic from databases compiled by World Bank, UNCTAD, and OECD.
(3) Students present their own opinions on a specific question for each topic.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
